flavorText:
"'Tis distance lends enchantment to the view,/ And robes the mountain in its azure hue."
—Thomas Campbell, "Pleasures of Hope"
name: Hammerheim
originalText:
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target creature loses all landwalk abilities until end of turn.

rulings.text: This can be used on a creature without landwalking but has no effect.
Causing a creature to lose landwalk abilities is useful only during the declare attackers step or earlier. Once the declare blockers step begins, it’s too late to block the creature.

text:
{T}: Add {R}.
{T}: Target creature loses all landwalk abilities until end of turn.
